metadata.title: High Polish 14k White Gold Good Luck Honu Hawaiian Sea Turtle Charm Pendant
features: fine lucky jewelry charm for your bracelet or pendant for your necklace
intricately handmade with solid 14 karat white gold in perfect polished finish
comes with free special gift packaging
made in the USA yet offered at factory direct jewelry price
ships from the manufacturer directly to the customers
description: Those with the turtle as their animal symbol can relate to the "sure and steady" message this creature brings to our lives. Because of its seemingly wide-eyed, long-lived, carefree attitude the turtle is often thought to be the wisest of souls among the animal kingdom.
